column1: Table 5-19:  Quantitative Uncertainty Estimates of N2O Emissions from Agricultural Soil Management in 2017 (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent)

column5: Uncertainty Range Relative to Emission Estimate

column2: Notes: Due to lack of data, uncertainties in managed manure N production, PRP manure N production, other organic fertilizer amendments, and biosolids (i.e., sewage sludge) amendments to soils are currently treated as certain; these sources of uncertainty will be included in future Inventory reports.
